phase_history.notes: Deep House Spring Reverb. 7 parameters: mix, decay, tension, pre_delay, damping, wobble, drive. Dark & Minimal aesthetic.
Two-string allpass spring tank. LFO wobble modulation. tanh drive stage. Phased implementation (3 sub-phases).
NeoGrid Minimal library applied. 680×280px, 3-panel layout (Input/Spring/Output). SVG arc knobs, cyan on near-black. v1-ui-spec.md, v1-style-guide.md, v1-test.html created.

All 3 phases implemented. Schroeder allpass spring tank (2 strings × 3 AP sections). LFO wobble modulation. tanh drive. RT60 feedback gain. JUCE WebView2 editor with 7 WebSliderRelay parameters. BinaryData resource provider.

framework_selection.rationale: Dark & Minimal aesthetic is best served by HTML5 Canvas — pixel-perfect black panel, CSS-controlled labels, no custom C++ widget code needed. WebView2 is the natural fit for this visual style.
